title.rendered: This 65-inch OLED Smart TV is 52% cheaper

content.rendered:
The model is a Panasonic TX-65HZ1000Ea 65-inch OLED Smart TV with a 52% discount on its recommended price.

65-inch OLEDs

This Panasonic Smart TV features a Master HDR OLED panel, which illuminates each zone independently. Thanks to this panel, it offers accurate color, deep blacks and exact details. It features 4K resolution (3,840 x 2,160 pixels) and is compatible with HDR10+, the highest standard for color, contrast, and image clarity, and HLG. Dolby Vision IQ uses an advanced ambient light sensor in the TV to display every detail of the picture tailored to the lighting conditions in your living room.

MasterHDR OLED

It has a 120Hz refresh rateso it may be one of the best value for money choices you can find if you want to play the new generation of consoles at 120 frames per second.

The new Filmmaker Mode It allows, just by pressing a button, to see the films as the director conceived them. Designed together with the world’s leading directors to preserve the color, contrast, aspect ratio and frame rate of your movies.

If you are a fan of streaming platforms, you will be happy to know that it also has a curious mode calibrated for Netflix, with adjustments for a better image on this platform. In addition, it also has the “Netflix Recommended TV” seal of qualityan evaluation program that recognizes TVs that offer better performance, easier access to applications and new features that make a Smart TV a better device.

immersive sound

Built-in, ceiling-facing speakers incorporate Dolby Atmos, immersing you in sound and transporting you from the couch to the movie with cleaner, more immersive audio that cuts out as much external and internal noise as possible. It has a sound power of 30 W (15 W x2) between its two integrated speakers.

Cinema Surround Pro It is ideal for improving the sound in movies or series, since, depending on the genre, the levels will be adjusted differently, in order to offer a better experience.

Introduces the operating system My Home Screen 5.0, which allows you to easily organize your favorite applications on the home screen, for a fast and intuitive experience. In addition, it is compatible with Google Assistant to facilitate navigation and access to your favorite content.

Its previous price was 2,499 euros, but today it can be yours for 1,199.20 euros. It can even be even cheaper. Remember that if you subscribe to El Corte Ingles+, this store’s free delivery service, you will enjoy a 10% discount on your first purchase up to a maximum of 100 euros, which would reduce the price to just €1,099.

The articles listed contain an affiliate link that reports to ADSLZone a small commission for each purchase. The products that appear here have been chosen by the editors for being discounted, and their appearance here has nothing to do with any agreement with the brands.
